myAbout.name: Thien Thuan Nguyen
myAbout.bio: A highly motivated, results-drive software engineer with many years experience, who is constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques. I am very passionate about Software Development, and strive to better myself as a developer, and the development community as a whole.

description.name: Designed and debugged desktop application in C#/WPF with MVVM, MVCVM, and SOLID Principle.
Designed and implemented highly interactive Windows-based GUI for application setup & part inspection using XAML.
Integrate the existing math and image processing library for point fitting in order to calculate distance between geometries such as point-line distance.
Agile software development process with Scrum.
Creating programs ranging from simple inspection to complicated logic-based graphical user interfaces, based on customer specifications
Developing, preparing, conducting customer training classes in machine operations and programming
Consulting with customers to determine hardware, software or system specification requirements
Providing product demonstrations of hardware and software to prospective customers

projects.title: InSpec
projects.description: Implement 3D Measurement Software for Precision System using WPF (C#, XAML, MVVM)

projects.title: CryptoForum
projects.description: Implement a back-end server forum for cryptocurrency discussion (Node.JS, Express, EJS, MongoDB)

projects.title: About Me
projects.description: Implement a front-end website About Me (React.JS)

projects.title: Weather Forecast
projects.description: Implement a front-end website to get five-day forecast in your favorite city (React.JS)
